TEXT.English: Equivalent in style to the Horse Archer units. Strongest base early withdrawal - even battle hardened deer can be skittish creatures that can be tough to KEEP in the battle for long but makes them GREAT at wearing down opponents. They'd be perhaps the best at this get in/get out type of strategy so long as they can do some damage during their short fights.[PARAGRAPH:2]There is no evidence this unit was ever used. It is part of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alternate timeline technologies[COLOR_REVERT]. Technologies that might have been.
TEXT.Italian: Equivalent in style to the Horse Archer units. Strongest base early withdrawal - even battle hardened deer can be skittish creatures that can be tough to KEEP in the battle for long but makes them GREAT at wearing down opponents. They'd be perhaps the best at this get in/get out type of strategy so long as they can do some damage during their short fights.[PARAGRAPH:2]Non c'è alcuna prova che quest'unità sia mai stata usata in battaglia. Fa parte delle [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alternate timeline technologies[COLOR_REVERT]. Tecnologie che potrebbero essere esistite.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Deer Archer[COLOR_REVERT] is similar to the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horse Archer[COLOR_REVERT] but better against archers, and with a bonus on hills, at city defense and in arctic terrain combat.

Equivalent in style to the Horse Rider units. Strongest base early withdrawal - even battle hardened deer can be skittish creatures that can be tough to KEEP in the battle for long but makes them GREAT at wearing down opponents. They'd be perhaps the best at this get in/get out type of strategy so long as they can do some damage during their short fights.[PARAGRAPH:2]There is no evidence this unit was ever used. It is part of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alternate timeline technologies[COLOR_REVERT]. Technologies that might have been.
TEXT.Italian: Equivalent in style to the Horse Rider units. Strongest base early withdrawal - even battle hardened deer can be skittish creatures that can be tough to KEEP in the battle for long but makes them GREAT at wearing down opponents. They'd be perhaps the best at this get in/get out type of strategy so long as they can do some damage during their short fights.[PARAGRAPH:2]Non c'è alcuna prova che quest'unità sia mai stata usata in battaglia. Fa parte delle [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alternate timeline technologies[COLOR_REVERT]. Tecnologie che potrebbero essere esistite.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Deer Riders[COLOR_REVERT] are early-game mounted units. This particular rider rides [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT] instead [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses.[COLOR_REVERT]. They have bonus in city and hills defense, when fighting in arctic terrain and vs Archers.

Equivalent style to the Light Horse Cavalry units. Strongest base early withdrawal - even battle hardened deer can be skittish creatures that can be tough to KEEP in the battle for long but makes them GREAT at wearing down opponents. They'd be perhaps the best at this get in/get out type of strategy so long as they can do some damage during their short fights.[PARAGRAPH:2]There is no evidence this unit was ever used. It is part of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alternate timeline technologies[COLOR_REVERT]. Technologies that might have been.
TEXT.Italian: Non c'è alcuna prova che quest'unità sia mai stata usata in battaglia. Fa parte delle [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alternate timeline technologies[COLOR_REVERT]. Tecnologie che potrebbero essere esistite.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Light Deer[COLOR_REVERT] are excellent tundra units. They are also good at Forest Combat and Fast

There is no evidence deer were ever trained for warfare. The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Deer Trainer[COLOR_REVERT] building is part of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alternate timeline technologies[COLOR_REVERT]. Technologies that might have been.[PARAGRAPH:2]Strongest base early withdrawal - even battle hardened deer can be skittish creatures that can be tough to KEEP in the battle for long but makes them GREAT at wearing down opponents. They'd be perhaps the best at this get in/get out type of strategy so long as they can do some damage during their short fights.
TEXT.Italian: Non ci sono prove che i cervi siano mai stati usati in battaglia. L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Allevatore di cervi[COLOR_REVERT] fa parte delle [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alternate timeline technologies[COLOR_REVERT]. Tecnologie che potrebbero essere esistite.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Deer Trainer[COLOR_REVERT] is required to train [LINK=UNIT_DEERRIDER]Deer Riders[\LINK], [LINK=UNIT_DEER_ARCHER]Deer Archers[\LINK] and [LINK=UNIT_DEER_LIGHT]Light Deer[\LINK].
TEXT.Italian: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Allevatore di cervi[COLOR_REVERT] è necessario per addestrare [LINK=UNIT_DEERRIDER]Cavalcatori su cervi[\LINK] e [LINK=UNIT_DEER_ARCHER]Arcieri su cervo[\LINK].

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_YELLOW]HELP: [COLOR_REVERT]Build Deer buildings and units faster in this city.
TEXT.French: Construit les bâtiments et unités cervidées plus vite dans cette Ville.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_YELLOW]HELP: [COLOR_REVERT]This free building is used to enable the building of the special deer units in all your cities.
TEXT.French: Ce bâtiment permet l'entraînement d'unités cervidées dans toutes vos villes.

TEXT.English: The Heratage building upgrades the Training Wonder to allow the special units to be built in all your cities.
The Deer Heritage buildings allows the building ofdeer units in all your cities.
